title: Wedbush assigns outperform ratings to Keurig Dr Pepper, Coca-Cola and Pepsi
text:
Shares of Keurig Dr. Pepper are up 0.3% in 2022, while Coca-Cola is down 8.1% and Pepsi is lower by 6.8%. Monster Beverage is down 5.2% in 2022 and Celsius Holdings is up 19.7%. The S&P 500 SPX is down 24.2% in 2022 and the Nasdaq COMP has lost 32.6%.

Wedbush assigns outperform ratings to Keurig Dr Pepper, Coca-Cola and Pepsi
